plugins.name: Mikrotik Monitoring

plugins.description: Speedtest plugin is designed to provide users with an easy and efficient way to measure their internet connection speed directly through the PHPNuxBill interface.

plugins.name: IPDR Plugin | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: Internet Protocol Detail Record (IPDR) to log Customer activity, Works with Hotspot, PPPOE, and radius. To download this, you need to setup Github Authentication
plugins.author: ibnux

plugins.name: Twilio-Plugin | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: Using Twillio as Gateway to send SMS or Whatsapp
plugins.author: ibnux

plugins.name: Hotspot System | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: Phpnuxbill Hotspot System Plugin is a powerful and versatile tool for managing and automating hotspot networks. It is designed to be integrated with the Phpnuxbill billing and customer management platform, providing a comprehensive solution for small and medium-sized businesses that offer public internet access.
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Support Ticket System | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: The Phpnuxbill Plugin Support Ticket is a powerful and versatile plugin designed to enhance customer support and streamline ticket management within your Phpnuxbill environment. This plugin provides a seamless and efficient way to handle customer inquiries, technical issues, and other support-related matters.
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: MPesa STKPush Hotspot System Gateway | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: The MPesa STKPush Hotspot System Payment Gateway allows users to seamlessly pay for internet access using MPesa. It integrates directly with the hotspot system for phpnuxbill, prompting users to authorize payments via their mobile device, ensuring a secure and efficient transaction process. This gateway simplifies the payment experience, making it easier for customers to purchase internet access on the go. works with hotspot system only.
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Paystack Hotspot System Gateway | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: The Paystack Hotspot System Payment Gateway is a secure and efficient solution that enables users to pay for Wi-Fi hotspot access using Paystack's reliable payment processing platform. It integrates seamlessly with the hotspot system for phpnuxbill, offering a smooth payment experience with various payment methods, ensuring fast and hassle-free transactions for users accessing internet services, works with hotspot system only.
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Advanced Radius-MySQL Data Usage | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: Advanced Data Usage Plugin for Radius-MySQL, its designed to monitor user daily weekly and monthtly data consumption, To download this, you need to setup Github Authentication.
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Advanced Mikrotik PPPoE Data Usage | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: Advanced Mikrotik PPPoE Data Usage, it use Mikrotik API to get user data use and live traffic it works only if the user is onine, To download this, you need to setup Github Authentication.
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Suspension and Payment Page | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: Suspension Page with payment processing page, its designed to ease customer payment, with user verification, This plugin is free but you have purchased the payment gateway.
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: User Data Usage Plugin
plugins.description: The User Data Usage Plugin is a feature for the Phpnuxbill for both user and admin , any suggestions just send it on whatsapp +249912740956.
plugins.author: amolood
